title: Visa Requirements
subtitle: Important Information for International Participants
welcome: We are delighted to welcome you to the Building Bridges Conference, taking place in Paris from October 28–31, 2025.
readCarefully: Please read the following information carefully if you are traveling from outside France.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer on Travel and Visa Responsibilities
disclaimer.intro: The Fédération Protestante de France and Église Kerygma are not responsible for:
notResponsibleFor: Issuing invitation letters for visa applications
Covering any costs related to your travel or participation in the event

expenses.intro: This includes, but is not limited to:
items: Visa application fees or any travel arrangements
expenses.conclusion: All these expenses must be covered entirely by each participant or their sending organization.

visaType.title: Visa Type
visaType.info: As this is a short-term event, attendees must apply for a Schengen short-stay tourist visa, which typically covers stays of up to 90 days within the Schengen area.
visaType.personal: This visa must be applied for personally in your country of residence.

resources.title: Helpful Resources for Your Application
resources.intro: To guide you through the visa process, we recommend visiting the following official websites:
resources.franceVisas: France Visas – Official French Visa Portal

conclusion.appreciation: We appreciate your understanding and cooperation. This policy ensures clarity and transparency for all international participants.
conclusion.questions: If you have questions regarding the conference itself (not visa matters), feel free to contact:
